lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: After 18 years in the investment world, God has called me to walk with the poor and find ways to connect those in need with those with the means to change lives.
lenders.occupational_info: God's call in my life is to help the poor take steps out of poverty thru sourcing and selling beautiful hand crafted items from those in poverty. They are paid fair, living wages, have safe and appropriate working conditions, and do not involve child labor.

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: why not?

lenders.name: charl
lenders.loan_because: I think i can make a difference.I started my own business and would love to give people jobs but i need to expand.I make resin toilet seat with enything u can think inside of them and the demand is big,but because it is handmade it is expensive and i need alot of workers,but money is the problem

lenders.name: Beauty Schools Directory
lenders.loan_because: The BeautySchoolsDirectory.com team is dedicated to helping people change their lives through education and training in the beauty industry. In the same vein we desire to lend to entrepreneurs who are attempting to make a better life for themselves in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: Our team helps people locate, compare, and contact beauty schools and cosmetology schools. We assist people by connecting them to programs in the beauty disciplines, including hairstyling, esthetics and skin care, make up artistry, barbering, nail technology and more.

lenders.name: Miles Jaffe
lenders.loan_because: It's not good fortune if you don't share it.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.  I loan because all things are cyclical.  I loan because I see the world as a neighbor.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make movie look the way they should in the theater or in your home - dark or bright, cold or warm.

lenders.name: Brendan
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Devin
lenders.loan_because: Through the travels of my job I have seen too many good people who want a better life for them and there family, but need a little help getting there.

lenders.name: ParkPLUS Valet
lenders.loan_because: The importance of synergy!
lenders.occupational_info: We manage parking facilities and other related parking operations.

lenders.name: Glen
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all have a responsibility to serve others.  We live 65 miles from the nearest town which limits any volunteering.  Kiva fits.
lenders.occupational_info: Raising cattle, horses, making art knives and doing leatherwork.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected

lenders.name: Malcolm
lenders.loan_because: Small business is the answer to uplifting the majority of people. Go for it!

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help, becauseI can help and because I should help...
lenders.occupational_info: R.N.

lenders.name: Carlin
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed economically and believe it is my obligation and joy to help those less fortunate than myself. I want to support those trying to better themselves and not relying on the government to improve their lives. I have a lot of respect for an entrepreneurial spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I specialize in custom design work for websites, interfaces... layout and design for improved user experiences.

lenders.name: Anette
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving. It makes me feel my life is worth something if I can help somebody else. I prefer giving than receiving.  It makes me very grateful and happy to give.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: Freely ye received, freely give.

lenders.name: Eric and Amanda
lenders.loan_because: it's fun and effective and a gift and keeps on giving.
lenders.occupational_info: We do a lot of studying, cooking and things outside.

lenders.name: Gavril
lenders.loan_because: I know that the most important thing I do in my life is to be of service and I think Kiva is a great way to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help protect the cyber world from the dark forces.

lenders.name: Tori
lenders.loan_because: I think mirco leanding is a brilliant idea and a wonderful way to make a big impact on someone's life with a small amount of money.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I believe giving someone an opportunity to help themselves is the most rewarding way to give.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Its time for me to start giving back the opportunities that were handed to me in life.

lenders.name: Steve Young
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to demonstrate Gods love in a practical way

lenders.name: Rezar & Elona
lenders.loan_because: I like to help in someway those who need help, do not have much and are trying to progress their lives and provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the biopharmaceutical industry.  I support manufacture of medications making sure they are are produced within specification.

lenders.name: Ruth,
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to be helping someone else.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: KIva was a gift from my Aunt Pookie. I loaned to help expand a cafe because he needed help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 8 years old and in 3rd grade. I like to be outside a lot. I like sledding and running around.

lenders.name: Ed R.
lenders.loan_because: It is simply the right thing to do. I truely believe what you put into the world will come back to you ten-fold. It is our responsibility to leave this world in better shape than we found it!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a News Director, which is a person who manages the news department for a TV station.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: This is a perpetual way to give back and make a difference. After your loan is paid back you get to choose someone else to make a loan to - and that continues as long as you want. I can't think of any other way to give money and have it make a difference over and over again!
lenders.occupational_info: I run a non-profit housing organization that operates a locally based revolving loan fund, not that much different from the KIVA concept. We lend money to those that cannot access funds through traditional venues.

lenders.name: Shane and Lea
lenders.whereabouts: Cape Town Western Cape, South Africa

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky to have the ability to impact the lives of others.

lenders.name: Nwora
lenders.loan_because: I was born in the 3rd world and understand the difference that a few dollars can make in someones life.

lenders.name: collins
lenders.loan_because: Is to expand my family business.
lenders.occupational_info:
well I and my wife sell first grade cloths and other clothing materials, down ajangbadi first b/stop ojo, Lagos.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: Tikun olam.  We must all help each other to improve our world.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people live a better life and do whatever I can towards eliminating poverty around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a small church overseeing communications, outreach and newcomers' ministires.

lenders.name: Brian & Jessi
lenders.loan_because: Owning your own business allows you the freedom to enjoy life.

lenders.name: Kao
lenders.loan_because: Simply because it feels good to give.  I'm already sponsoring a child but lending to someone so they can change their lives is such a great idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Securities Market.  it's a very stressfull environment but compare to what a family can go through everyday to survive, it's really not comparable. This is my way to help them out.

lenders.occupational_info: I help people create self-awareness so that they may experience their best life! :)

lenders.occupational_info: I do what I can.

Seeing the photos, reading the stories...

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I can help someone else.

lenders.name: Owen
lenders.loan_because: Why not?

lenders.name: Kimberly

lenders.name: Sidney
lenders.loan_because: I know how even a small boost can positively impact someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help build homes for people who are less fortunate.

lenders.name: Mike, Lynn & Mia
lenders.loan_because: I can, and because I should and because I want to help women get ahead whenever I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Mike & I make short films as often as we can, commercials for television and corporate videos as often as we need to, and I am a painter who sells my work on a regular basis here in California.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: Why wouldn't I?

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: i work at keeping mommy and daddy busy

lenders.name: Phuong
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is such a great idea and a way to make a difference.  I appreciate the opportunity!
lenders.occupational_info: I write books to help parents help their kids with behavior problems.  For example "ADD/ADHD Drug Free", and "SmartHelp for Good 'n' Angry Kids"

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I LOAN BECAUSE I CAN. BUT MAINLY BECAUSE SOMEONE WHO IS TRYING TO HELP THEMSELVES DESERVES A LITTLE HELP
lenders.occupational_info: I HAVE STARTED OVER IN DIFFERENT COUNTRIES WITH NEARLY NOTHING EACH TIME. MY WORK IS JUST A SKILL NEEDED BY OTHERS, I THEREFORE CAN CHARGE FOR IT. EDUCATION IS NOT NECESARILY THE ANSWER FOR RURAL PEOPLE, HAVING A SKILL/PRODUCT OTHERS NEED IS CERTAINLY THE ANSWER. GET WISE, YOU ONLY HAVE ONE LIFE BUT YOU DO HAVE AS MANY CHANCES AS YOU ARE PREPARED TO TAKE.

lenders.name: Ada
lenders.loan_because: I have an International Business degree; however, only local citizens and natural resources benefit from my work.  KIVA is an excellent way to make an impact far from home.
lenders.occupational_info: Manage government programs that benefit natural resources through volunteerism.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: we "are"

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: "Of all the forces that make a better world, none is so powerful as HOPE.  With HOPE, one can think, one can work, one can dream. If you have HOPE, you have everything."
lenders.occupational_info: I support, comfort and care for women at the births of their newborns - then help the women care for themselves and their  babies.  I love my job.

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a global packaging company.  I find ways to reduce costs and increase sales by analyzing and then improving current business processes...

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe one person can make a difference.

lenders.name: Lynn

lenders.occupational_info: I work as best I can with someone else's donations to make sure they get to somewhere that does some good.

lenders.name: shana

lenders.name: Vicky

lenders.name: Melissa

lenders.name: Brian

lenders.name: David

lenders.name: Howard

lenders.name: Nicolas Mekchoudi

lenders.name: Jonelle A.

lenders.name: Myles

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Only economic justice will bring peace.

lenders.name: Austin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people better their lives.

lenders.name: MATTHEW

lenders.name: The Asbell Family
lenders.loan_because: Christ has blessed us abundantly and we hope to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a Christian family of 9 in the US. Clint is an electrician and works two jobs. Wendy is a stay at home mother who homeschools our 7 children. She also sells goat's milk soap and educational books. We live on a farm and breed Chihuahuas.

lenders.name: Clifford
lenders.loan_because: I get pleasure out of seeing hardworking and enterprising people get a small hand up to achieve a new level of success and relative prosperity.
lenders.occupational_info: I established a foundation that bores deep wells for African villages with no source of clean water.  We also give away bicycles to families with no other source of transportation.  See thecleanwaterfoundation.org

lenders.name: Gina

lenders.name: Camille
lenders.loan_because: Hope and help for someone else besides my selfish self. A teenie attempt to even out the world imbalance of money.

To improve the lifes of others

So - i'm not loosing any interest by lending the little money i have to hard working businesspeople who need the help. lenders.occupational_info: I used to be an on-site computer instructor.  I drove to people's homes & businesses and taught them how to use new hardware, software, and internet applications.

lenders.loan_because: we care.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my life and believe I should give back when I can.

lenders.occupational_info: I make films.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It helps enable people who want to help themselves.  I think it is very honorable to have a dream to expand your buisness in order to better yourself and your family.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a corrections officer in a jail that houses around 100 inmates year round. The jail is in a community with a population of 50,000. We see a wide variety of offenders from simple larceny charges to murder.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with a good life and there are those who need help.  I hope they are all successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I now help school systems with their classroom technology and play guitar with a bluegrass band.

lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate for what I have and I want others to feel just as fortunate.

lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: peter

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is the obligation of every American to share the wealth we are blessed with.  I may not have much, but many people have much less.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help and improve the human condition. I also enjoy helping those who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: A filmmaker who believes in a better tomorrow and would like to replace fear with hope. An actor who portrays the human condition to elicit an emotional response so that others may know.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people make their dreams come true, if I can, even if it's just in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: Male,55,Single,no kids.Like TV, old movies,internet,genealogy,fishing,keeping up with current events.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple and inexpensive way for individuals to act collectively and make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am employed by BT, a UK based provider of telecommunications services.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing for the world. I feel, as someone as fortunate as I, it is a duty to donate and loan to the less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I program for the Nintendo DS and Wii;

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
This was a Christmas gift from my sister in lieu of a tradtional gift exchange.  I'm thrilled to be able to put my gift to good use and look forward to an ongoing relationship with KIVA.  

I was recently on a trip to Cambodia and was captured by the warm spirit and friendliness of the people there - seeing how hard everyone worked day in and day out was a life changing experience for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large architecture firm in Minneapolis, MN where I help design, coordinate and manage construction projects for large corporations.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I believe everybody deserves a chance for a good life.  I am happy to help.

lenders.name: Brenna
lenders.loan_because: I know how lucky I am to have been born in the United States and to have a good job. Loaning is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage payments to my company, and make sure our bills are paid.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: Whenever I start to feel depressed, or I think that life is hard, I go to Kiva to gain perspective.  You can make such a difference in someone else's life with so little investment - it's very uplifting.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Stewardship of what God provides mandates that His allowances to one be shared for the benefit for all of His children
lenders.occupational_info: Consulting with Retail Merchants to improve their business

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: Such a small amount really can make a difference in numbers !

lenders.name: Staffan
lenders.loan_because: I want to support  fellow entrepreneurs globally.  We make the world a better place and encourage innovation.
lenders.occupational_info: I have experience in printing, automotive, and currently working in aerospace.  I'm an innovator and thrive on developing new electromechanical systems for aircraft's.

lenders.name: Aerin
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed. I live in an incredible location, have an amazing family, and I am able to seek education and other aspirations without thinking twice.  I know that life isn't this easy everywhere, and if all it takes is a little bit of help to get someone on their feet, then it is my responsibility to help. I prefer a "hand up" approach to charity as opposed to a "hand out" approach, and Kiva  exemplifies my philosophy on giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school to learn about the environment and ways that we can improve and help the world to ensure that it will stay beautiful for  future generations.  In order to pay for my schooling, I work at a law firm which specializes in lender liability, meaning that we hold big banks and other corporations accountable when they try to cheat their customers.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I desire to help hardworking  people accross the world who need to support themselves and their families.  I want to show Jesus Christ's love to those who perhaps wouldn't have a chance otherwise.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just finishing high school and will be entering college--probably a Bible college or to get my teaching credential.

lenders.name: Leigh-Ann
lenders.loan_because: When I travelled I saw so many wonderful things and beautiful people that were always friendly and helpful.  I want to return the favour!
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to assist those in my department which I like doing.  The bonus is that I work in sports which adds to the fun of the day.

lenders.name: HeidiB
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office making sure everything gets done for the business.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: with our help, they can achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to have a better life
lenders.occupational_info: I like being face to face with customers and helping them with their buying decisions

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse who works to make sure medical products are safe.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I feel I can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupation: Active duty military & small business owner
lenders.loan_because:
I know how tough it is to start a business without help in the U.S., and I can believe it is even more difficult in other parts of the world.  

Some great people believed in me and helped me on my way, so I now want to pass that help on to someone else in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I own two small businesses.  One is a pizza & sub shop, the other is a rental business servicing college students.  I am also currently serving on active duty with the U.S. Army in Michigan.

lenders.name: djalma
lenders.loan_because: Porque a burocracia de um emprestimo para ser pequeno revendedor é muito dificil, principalmente pelas exigencias e altos juros.
lenders.occupational_info: meu trabalho compreende de comprar a um ou mais distribuidor e realizar a revenda. Hoje tenho a oportunidade de ser representante e distribuidor direto de uma grande empresa, o que definitivamente daria condições de manter minha familia(esposa e três filhos menores), bem como ajudar de maneira geral minha familia e pessoas que estão como eu: sem dinheiro e querendo apenas um patrocinador para  que possamos viver dignamente no Brasil.

lenders.name: Mae
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see folks with good ideas, but no money be able to  start a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a teacher for 34 years, now retired and am a part time body worker; i.e. massage and watsu, a warm water massage.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because:
It’s time for a humanitarian revolution. The great advancements society has made in the past in other areas must now be made in the area of human dignity. 

It’s time to eliminate extreme poverty and all it’s horrible implications.

Now, more than ever, this revolution is possible.

We don’t lack resources, only will. 
We don’t lack ability, only determination. 
We don’t lack opportunities, only action.
